alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 3:56AM EDT until August 24 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM EDT FOR EASTERN WASHTENAW COUNTY... At 354 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Willis, or near Ypsilanti, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Milan around 400 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pittsfield Township, Delhi Mills, Whittaker and Barton Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
